title: 05/21/21 DPS Hour 2 John Smoltz
itunes:title: 05/21/21 DPS Hour 2 John Smoltz
description:
John Smoltz talks to Dan about all the no-hitters going on in major league baseball this season. Johns says he actually predicted that there would be a rise in no-hitters before the season got started.
